CustomField.formula: IF( IsCompleteMeetTeams__c && IsCompleteSalesforceTraining__c && IsCompleteMXTraining__c && IsCompleteRoleTraining__c && IsCompleteCompanyHeadshots__c && IsCompleteGeneralInduction__c && IsCompleteHealth_Safety__c && IsCompleteHRForms__c , "Complete","In Progress")
CustomField.label: Onboarding Status
